verses.verse: Behold <WG1492> <WG5628>, what manner <WG4217> of love <WG26> the Father <WG3962> hath bestowed <WG1325> <WG5758> upon us <WG2254>, that <WG2443> we should be called <WG2564> <WG5686> the sons <WG5043> of 'Elohim <WG2316>: therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> the world <WG2889> knoweth <WG1097> <WG5719> us <WG2248> not <WG3756>, because <WG3754> it knew <WG1097> <WG5627> him <WG846> not <WG3756>.

He that committeth <WG4160> <WG5723> sin <WG266> is <WG2076> <WG5748> of <WG1537> the devil <WG1228>; for <WG3754> the devil <WG1228> sinneth <WG264> <WG5719> from <WG575> the beginning <WG746>. Whosoever <WG3956> is born <WG1080> <WG5772> of <WG1537> 'Elohim <WG2316> doth <WG4160> <WG5719> not <WG3756> commit sin <WG266>; for <WG3754> his <WG846> seed <WG4690> remaineth <WG3306> <WG5719> in <WG1722> him <WG846>: and <WG2532> he cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> <WG5736> sin <WG264> <WG5721>, because <WG3754> he is born <WG1080> <WG5769> of <WG1537> 'Elohim <WG2316>.

Not <WG3756> as <WG2531> Kayin <WG2535>, who was <WG2258> <WG5713> of <WG1537> that wicked one <WG4190>, and <WG2532> slew <WG4969> <WG5656> his <WG846> brother <WG80>. And <WG2532> wherefore <WG5484> <WG5101> slew <WG4969> <WG5656> he him <WG846>? Because <WG3754> his own <WG846> works <WG2041> were <WG2258> <WG5713> evil <WG4190>, and <WG1161> his <WG846> brother's <WG80> righteous <WG1342>.

My <WG3450> little children <WG5040>, let us <WG25> not <WG3361> love <WG25> <WG5725> in word <WG3056>, neither <WG3366> in tongue <WG1100>; but <WG235> in deed <WG2041> and <WG2532> in truth <WG225>.
